name: Super Delivery Man, Woman, Children
description:
Super Delivery Man, Woman, Children: Help the people around town reach their various destinations. It can be dangerous to cross the street, so you need to help them.

You have no car, so you must carry the people around town. To save time you could also throw them.

Move: WASD keys, mouse controls the camera

Grab/Throw: left click

Features a small town where all the cars are speeding, and all the people can be thrown.
